text: tum unhen dekhate ho to unake shareer (baahy roop) tumhen achchhe lagate hai, aurayadi ve baat karen to unakee baat tum sunate rah jao. kintu yah aisa hee hai maano ve lakadee ke kunde hai, jinhen (deevaar ke sahaare) khada kar diya gaya ho. har zor kee aavaaz ko ve apane hee viruddh samajhate hai. vahee vaastavik shatru hain, atah unase bachakar raho. allaah kee maar unapar. ve kahaan ulte phire ja rahe hai
